imgPathList - Variable in class models.Product
 
index() - Static method in class controllers.Application
Method index() renders the index.html page with the following parameters, productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products); mainCategoryList - the list of our categories; pikShops - list of all of our registered pikShops;
indexAndroid(List<Product>) - Static method in class controllers.JsonController
Index page for Android;

isProtectedAdmin - Variable in class models.User
 
isRefunding - Variable in class models.Product
 
isSold - Variable in class models.Product
 
isSold() - Method in class models.Product
Gets the information whether the product is sold or not;
isSpecial - Variable in class models.Product
 
isSpecial() - Method in class models.Product
Return the value, true or false depending on whether the product has been set to be special or not; Meaning, The product is special if someone has spent/used their credits on the products;
